titleInfo.title: 75th Anniversary Celebration of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society

physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#451 JCRS - 75th Anniv, 1979''. On back of photograph: ''#451 AMC (JCRS) Far left Esther Winocur at 75th Anniversary Celebration Se 1979''.

mods.abstract: 75th Anniversary Celebration of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society (JCRS). Esther Winocur is pictured on the far left. The JCRS was a sanatorium for tuberculosis patients that was founded in 1904 by a group of immigrant Jewish workingmen along with the support of several leading physicians and rabbis in Denver, Colorado.
mods.note: Accession # 1271, Donated by AMC Cancer Research Center as part of the JCRS Records.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
